articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Zidane resigns as Real Madrid coach: reports - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The Frenchman's reported departure comes at the end of a disappointing campaign for the 13-time European champions, who also lost to Chelsea in the Champions League semi-finals as they failed to win a trophy for the first time in 11 seasons.

articles.title: Liverpool apologised but Barcelona, Real Madrid, Juventus statement shows ESL rebels are unrepentant - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool and the other English clubs withdrew but the remaining European Super League rebels seem unrepentant with their latest joint statement

articles.title: European Super League: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus remain committed to 'modernising football' - Sky Sports
articles.description: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus say they will not bow down to pressure in their attempts to launch a breakaway Super League.
